column4: which would be mitigated if people actually read documentiation
that doesn't sound ubuntu-specific at all

breezy is it, but dont' upgrade if you care about nvidia binary drivers
yes, rsh is symbolically linked to ssh

irc is a bad place for questions like that; I'd try the pvm list or ubuntu-users
